title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.5 - Depreciation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.5 - Depreciation

State Regulations

In accordance with an orderly program of depreciation, the cost of each aircraft shall be amortized in full over a period not to exceed seven years, but in no event shall such depreciation be for a longer period than is used for federal income tax purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
85.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
